summary: This is a July 2022 email chain between legal professionals regarding a confidential letter. The email references prior communications from December 2021 involving an unnamed individual and their attorneys, and requests the recipients to search for and forward any related correspondence.

persons.name: Peri Mornington
persons.context: Solicitor at Manleys Solicitors who sent the confidential correspondence on behalf of an unnamed client.

events.title: Prior Communications Referenced
events.description: The email references communications by email in December 2021 involving an unnamed individual and their attorneys.

events.title: Confidential Correspondence Sent
events.description: Peri Mornington sends a strictly private and confidential letter on behalf of an unnamed client to the recipients.

locations.address: 8-9 Grosvenor Court, 137-151 Foregate Street, Chester CH1 1HG
locations.description: Registered office of Manleys Solicitors Limited.

keyFacts: The document is a July 2022 email concerning strictly private and confidential legal correspondence.
It references prior communications from December 2021 involving an unnamed individual and their attorneys.
The sender, Peri Mornington, is a solicitor acting on behalf of an unnamed client.
The email requests recipients to search their inboxes for communications from the unnamed individual or her attorneys and forward them.
The document contains a standard legal confidentiality disclaimer from Manleys Solicitors.
